Articles.Content:
Here're a few designs to get you started on most any journey or any task. Some are practical, while others border on the ridiculous. All models are stock.

Planes:

The workhorse (flies well):

Wasp I-LR

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32989[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH]32990[/ATTACH]

The spaceplane:

Wasp IV Bumble Bee II

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32993[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH]32992[/ATTACH]

The circumnavigator (mechjeb assistance recommended as it gets very unstable):

Magellan III

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32994[/ATTACH]

The rocket carrier:

747+Shuttle

Rockets:

1-Man:

Minmus Lander I

Delta V ~ 7900 m/s

3-Man:

IPL VI

Delta V ~ 8000 m/s

Edited September 15, 2012 by Mindofscience3
you need to add =enteryourtexthere in your spoilers I mean the first ones. any nice looking stuff

Attached the files in a second post. Deleting the links in the first post due to limit of 5/post.

Bomber I (28 bombs, flies, and the pilot has a rocket plane escape pod thingy)
